title: Was Hillary Clinton Bribed for Her Iraq War Vote?
subtitle: During a March 2016 MSNBC Town Hall appearance, Hillary Clinton discussed her Iraq War vote, but she didn't suggest her vote was part of a political bribe.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Hillary Clinton admitted her Iraq War vote was elicited in exchange for money provided by the Bush administration to help rebuild New York City after the 9/11 attacks.
